subject: Re: [junit] Junit TestCase Generator for Swing based application.
msgSnippet: I work at Instantiations (makers of CodePro).  We have a junit test generation tool more targeted towards Swing-GUI based applications called Window Tester
messageBody:
I work at Instantiations (makers of CodePro). We have a junit test
generation tool more targeted towards Swing-GUI based applications called
Window Tester Pro. Feel free to contact me if you need additional
information:
brent(underscore)caldwell(at)instantiations


niks... wrote:
>
> I have tried to go through the various tools for JUnit Test Case
> Generation but am not able find a good tool for generating Test Cases for
> a Swing based application.
>
> I'm looking for something like CodePro but it fails when it comes to swing
> components. If anyone can suggest some good tool for the purpose, would be
> great. Any help is highly appreciated.
>
> ...regards
>
>

--
